name: Master Origin Ethiopia
description: Scent of orange blossom, but its notes of compote come from the drying of Arabica coffee cherries in the sun

name: Fortissio Lungo
description: An intense body and aroma in this blend was only possible with the presence of an Indian coffee bean, the Arabica Malabar grain of the Monção

name: Capriccio Espresso
description: A mix of Arabica from South America and a touch of Robusta, Capriccio is a rich espresso, with a very characteristic note of cereals

name: Arpeggio Intenso
description: Pure Arabica from South and Central America, very roasted, Arpeggio has an intense character and a dense body, reinforced by notes of cocoa

name: Caramelito Variation
description: The sweet caramel aroma softens the crisp notes of the Grand Cru Livanto
